# 50th Golden Bell Awards

The 50th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第50屆金鐘獎) was held on September 26, 2015 at Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by CTV.
